${ModID}:Insight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Obtain [E] [E] , and draw !${ModID}:M2! cards. NL Exhaust. Retain.

${ModID}:OctahedronDice.NAME: Octahedron Die
${ModID}:OctahedronDice.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Roll a 6-sided die, gain ${ModID}:Temporary Strength equal to the die roll × 1 . If the roll is 4 or higher, Inflict Weakness and Vulnerable on all enemys for 1 turn. If the roll is 6, doubled the gained ${ModID}:Temporary Strength and obtain [E] . NL Exhaust. Retain.

${ModID}:SymphonyOfHarmony.NAME: Symphony of Harmony
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The next ${ModID}:Command Card you play has +2 [E] Cost, and take effect twice.
The next ${ModID}:Command Card you play has it [E] Cost reduced by 2

${ModID}:UtopianVeil.NAME: Utopian Veil
${ModID}:UtopianVeil.DESCRIPTION: View 3 uncarried ${ModID}:Posse , choose 1 to release immediately. Obtain [E] , dispel your own Poison , ${ModID}:Sealed , ${ModID}:Stagnation state. NL Exhaust. Retain.

${ModID}:HoneyMead.NAME: Honey Mead
${ModID}:HoneyMead.DESCRIPTION: Obtain 2 stacks of ${ModID}:Barrier . NL Exhaust. Retain.

${ModID}:FaithOfTheDivineRealm.NAME: Faith of the Divine Realm
${ModID}:FaithOfTheDivineRealm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !${ModID}:A! ${ModID}:Aliemus . Weakness and Vulnerable all enemies for 1 turn. NL Exhaust. Retain.

${ModID}:SymptomDelusion.NAME: Symptom: Delusion
${ModID}:SymptomDelusion.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP, gain [E] [E] . Unremovable In Shop.

${ModID}:Wound.NAME: Wound
${ModID}:Wound.DESCRIPTION: A minor injury, nothing serious. Take !M! damage. draw !${ModID}:DR! cards. NL Exhaust. Removed When Discarded.

${ModID}:Convulsion.NAME: Convulsion
${ModID}:Convulsion.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:State Card 。 NL Unplayable. Removed When Discarded.

${ModID}:DimensionLock.NAME: Dimension Lock
${ModID}:DimensionLock.DESCRIPTION: After unleashing ${ModID}:Exalt, sealed for 2 turns. NL Unplayable.

${ModID}:Soffocation.NAME: Soffocation
${ModID}:Soffocation.DESCRIPTION: At the end of the turn, if in hand, obtain !M! stacks of Poison .

${ModID}:MutatedHeart.NAME: Mutated Heart
${ModID}:MutatedHeart.DESCRIPTION: Discard all your cards, then draw a number of cards equal to the number of discarded cards + 3 . NL Exhaust Retain

${ModID}:Unrestrained.NAME: Unrestrained
${ModID}:Unrestrained.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${ModID}:Temporary Strength . All enemies gain !${ModID}:M2! ${ModID}:Temporary Strength . Remains in the deck after the battle. NL Exhaust Retain Destroy
